Uses of Class
com.codename1.ui.geom.Matrix

  • Packages that use Matrix 
    Package Description
    com.codename1.impl
    The implementation package should not be used by developers, it is an internal implementation detail which will break compatibility between major Codename One releases.
    com.codename1.ui
    Main widget package containing the component/container "composite" similar both in terminology and design to Swing/AWT.

    • Uses of Matrix in com.codename1.impl

      Methods in com.codename1.impl with parameters of type Matrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CodenameOneImplementation.getTransform(java.lang.Object graphics, Matrix m)
      Gets the current transformation matrix.
      void CodenameOneImplementation.setTransform(java.lang.Object graphics, Matrix m, int originX, int originY)
      Sets the transformation matrix to be applied to all drawing operations.

    • Uses of Matrix in com.codename1.ui

      Methods in com.codename1.ui with parameters of type Matrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Graphics.getTransform(Matrix matrix)
      Gets the transformation matrix that is currently applied to this graphics context.
      void Graphics.setTransform(Matrix matrix)
      Sets the transformation Matrix to apply to drawing in this graphics context.
      void Graphics.setTransform(Matrix matrix, int originX, int originY)
      Sets the transformation matrix to apply to drawing in this graphics context, using the specified origin for transformations (e.g.
